description: The series revolved around the life and times of Newt Call as he set out to make his way in the world. Newt participated in some of the major events of the Western era while encountering some of the frontier's legendary figures.
keywords: tv mini series,1870s,southern colonel,newlywed couple,post civil war
name: Lonesome Dove: The Series

review.name: Better than "The Outlaw Years"
review.reviewBody: I thought it was a great show and was sorry to see it end. It was much better than the later "Outlaw Years" episodes. "The Outlaw Years" were good but I don't think they had the heart that "The Series" did. They were just more enjoyable and was very well acted. Watch both and see what you think, and although many will disagree with me, I think that "The Series" surpassed "The Outlaw Years" by a long shot.
